item.title: Simple Minecraft Merchant Stand
item.description: This extremely simple design was made for my Minecraft Realm’s trading zone. Use string to suspend the carpet when it is not above a fence or sign. Unfortunately I am unable to provide a build guide step by step right now, but I will add it in some later post. Materials List Block Name Quantity Barrel 3 Oak Trap Door 1 Stone Brick Wall 2 Spruce Stairs 4 Oak Fence 4 Birch Sign 1 Carpet 20 Oak Gate 3 String 12
